Paris, 26 August (reporter Ge Wenbo) on the 26aad, Lu Shaye, ambassador Chinese to France, attended the annual meeting of the French employees' Association and held discussion on the topics of New World War with former Prime Minister Rafael lafane, former Italian Prime Minister Lela, and some French economists and geopolitical scholars.   Lu Shaye wuxuu naadiyey in Shiinaha ma aha Mareykanka, Shiinana ma rabo inuu noqdo Mareykanka labaad. Haatan Mareykanku ma raalli in uu dhameeyo waajibaadkiisa caalamiga ah iyo in uu ka tagayo kooxda, laakiin ma aha qasdi in uu dib u noqdo raadinta hegemoni.Shiinaha waxay ka raadsan kartaa horumarinta dalka iyo hagaajinta standardka nolosha dadka.Haddii Shiinaha hada hore u socda, waxaa loola jeedaa in Shiinaha horay uga horumariyey horay, taas darteed waxay qaadatay waajibaadyo ka badan oo caalami ah iyo waxay ka qayb qaadatay in ka badan dadka oo dhan.Horumarinta China waa fursad ay wadamada kale uga hanjabaan.Shiinaha waa suuqa weyn oo ay leedahay 1.4 billion oo isticmaalayaal, furidda dunida waxay ku contributeysaa dib u soo celinta dhaqaalaha caalamiga ah kadib.
